text: #COVID19:As it’s announced that more than 30m people in the #UK have had 1st dose of a Covid #vaccine and the govt. says it’s "confident" everyone will get their 2nd jab within 12 weeks, @BorisJohnson urges:”Please make sure you get your second dose when you are called to do so”. https://t.co/G6t3Tgb5AA
